test_Description:
1.Open browser and navigate to URL :
"https://lcaas.techmahindra.com/vb6/
2. Enter the value 'admin' in the field.
3. Enter the value 'admin1' in the field.
4. Click on 'Login'.
5. Click on 'CRUD'.
6. Click on 'All'.
7. Click on 'Submit'.
8. Click on 'select * from TranMainTab where tranType='D' and (trandate >=# & DateFormat(fDate) & # and trandate <=# & DateFormat(tDate) & #) order by TranNo'.
9. Click on 'Screen Report'.
10. Click on 'Screen Validation'.
11. Click on 'Submit'.
